ygData.subject: 3rd Book
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello everyone I have been on this list now for about month just watching hoping something good would come up.  Well the new recipes kick ass, even a lvl 12
ygData.messageBody:
Hello everyone I have been on this list now for about month just watching
hoping something good would come up. Well the new recipes kick ass, even a
lvl 12 can tinkering most of em. :P Anyways last night I was messaging a
couple tinkers on Xegony who had been bothering my friend becuase he had a
collapsable fishing pole. They said that they should be the only ones who
knew how to do it and called him a cheater and a whole bunch of other stuff.
Anyway while I was talking to them I found out this is their price list:
5pp for fireworks(Not sure there worth that much)
50pp stalking probe
15pp fishing pole
100pp Spyglass
Also when I inquired where they got the book from they wouldn't tell me
exactly but they did tell me that it was a very high quest. It took a lvl
47 warrior to complete the quest. Also I found out that the quest is not in
Akanon but I didn't ask about Steamfont. Well that's all the info I have
for right now. Happy questing. :)

Marcoux
Lvl 12 Magician on Xegony
